title: When it comes to sustainability and stewardship, tell your own story - TurfNet
summary: Golf courses are often criticized for their environmental impact, but many superintendents are committed to sustainability. They are using innovative methods to reduce water use, conserve energy, and protect wildlife. Some golf courses are even opening their doors to the public to show how they are managing their land responsibly.

title: Venator Awarded Prestigious Gold Medal from EcoVadis for Sustainability Performance - PR Newswire
summary: Venator Materials PLC, a global manufacturer of chemical products, achieved a Gold Medal from EcoVadis for its commitment to sustainability. The EcoVadis assessment evaluates 21 sustainability criteria across four core themes, including Environment, Labor & Human Rights, Ethics and Sustainable Procurement. Venator's Gold Medal reflects its enhanced performance in these areas, positioning it among the top 4% of companies rated globally.
likely_naics_codes: ['325131 Inorganic Chemical Manufacturing', '325132 Organic Chemical Manufacturing', '325181 Alkalies and Chlorine Manufacturing', '325188 Other Basic Inorganic Chemical Manufacturing']

title: Novozymes, Chr. Hansen unveil name of future combined company - Aquafeed.com
summary: Novozymes and Chr. Hansen have merged to create Novonesis, a global biosolutions group. The name Novonesis means “a new beginning” and reflects the company’s commitment to using biological sciences and technology to solve global challenges. The combined group will have a global network of more than 23 manufacturing sites and close to 40 R&D and application centers that employ around 10,000 employees.
green_innovation: TRUE, the merger of Novozymes and Chr. Hansen to create Novonesis is a green innovation because it will bring together two companies that are leaders in the development of biological solutions to global challenges.
business_innovation: FALSE, the merger of Novozymes and Chr. Hansen is not a business innovation because it does not involve the introduction of a new or improved product or business process.
green_product: FALSE, the article does not describe a specific green product.
green_process: FALSE, the article does not describe a specific green process.

title: Lezlee Westine Reflects on Her Tenure as President & CEO of Personal Care Products Council - Happi
summary: Lezlee Westine retired in 2023 from her position as President and CEO of the Personal Care Products Council (PCPC). During her tenure, the PCPC led the cosmetics industry to commit to more sustainable practices and innovation, including the exchange of industry best practices and the strengthening of relationships with key stakeholders. Tom Myers, PCPC's executive vice president for legal & regulatory affairs and general counsel, has stepped into the role of President and CEO.
product_or_process: Developing critical partnerships that have extended PCPC's reach and influence

title: BWH Hotels and Call2Recycle Bring Battery Recycling Practices to the Canadian Hospitality Sector - GlobeNewswire
summary: Battery recycling is a critical part of Canada's effort to reduce its carbon footprint by reusing waste materials. BWH Hotels, a leading global hospitality enterprise, has implemented battery recycling across its Canadian portfolio of hotels as part of their sustainability strategy. This initiative is part of BWH's global “Because We Care” sustainability program, which is aimed at increasing sustainable practices and reducing the carbon footprint across the hotel network.

title: Best Agrolife acquires 99% stake in Kashmir Chemicals - Indian Chemical News
summary: Best Agrolife Ltd. (BAL) has invested in Kashmir Chemicals, a pesticide formulation manufacturer, to expand its manufacturing capacity and meet the growing demand for branded agrochemical products. BAL also received a patent for its innovative herbicidal composition, "Orisulam."
green_innovation: TRUE, the patented herbicidal composition reduces the environmental impact of paddy farming by reducing the need for multiple herbicide applications.

green_product: TRUE, the patented herbicidal composition, "Orisulam," is a green product because it reduces the environmental impact of paddy farming by reducing the need for multiple herbicide applications.
green_process: FALSE, the article does not describe a green process.
